title: Understanding the Concept
text: The average number of fruits consumed per day is a summary measure derived from the data collected from the survey. What is this type of measure called?

title: Differentiate Between Terms
text: Consider the terms: variable, population, statistic, and data. Which one best describes a summary measure calculated from a sample?

title: Identify the Correct Term
text: The average number of fruits consumed per day is a summary measure calculated from the sample data. This is known as a...
